retweeted_status.full_text: Hi @ritasijelmass, just heard about your talk yesterday at Dev Picnic. I was wondering if you've ever looked at or thought about calculating the carbon footprint of our internet usage? It would be great to know what we do to the planet by using the internet as much as we do.
